about_the_game:
Enable an in-game guide covering the third season of Being a DIK.

Press the 'g' key at any time while playing Being a DIK - Season 3 to bring up the guide.

You can also bring up the guide by clicking the Guide button found in the quick menu.

The interface includes a quick navigation system that lets you jump to sections of the guide and jump to the page that's most relevant to the current choice in your ongoing game.

With this guide, you can get help with:

  • Finding every collectible in Season 3

  • Unlocking every lewd scene in Season 3

  • Unlocking every achievement in Season 3

  • Finding out what the characters think about your choices in Season 3

  • Finding out how your choices will affect different scenes in the game in Season 3

  • Mastering every mini-game in Season 3

The guide is packed with images and to-the-point text.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game graphically depicts sex, usage of drugs and violence. The story is not intended for players being in a dark period of their lives. If you are easily offended or just looking for a fun game only, this game is not for you.

All sexual acts in the game are consensual.

detailed_description:
DLC requirements

Being a DIK: Season 3 - The complete official guide requires the base game Being a DIK - Season 1, the Being a DIK - Season 2 DLC, and the Being a DIK - Season 3 DLC in order to play.


About the Game

Enable an in-game guide covering the third season of Being a DIK.

Press the 'g' key at any time while playing Being a DIK - Season 3 to bring up the guide.

You can also bring up the guide by clicking the Guide button found in the quick menu.

The interface includes a quick navigation system that lets you jump to sections of the guide and jump to the page that's most relevant to the current choice in your ongoing game.

With this guide, you can get help with:

  • Finding every collectible in Season 3

  • Unlocking every lewd scene in Season 3

  • Unlocking every achievement in Season 3

  • Finding out what the characters think about your choices in Season 3

  • Finding out how your choices will affect different scenes in the game in Season 3

  • Mastering every mini-game in Season 3

The guide is packed with images and to-the-point text.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 80 MB available space

name: Being a DIK: Season 3 - The complete official guide

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 80 MB available space

short_description: An in-game guide for Season 3 of Being a DIK, including a walkthrough, how to unlock everything, and more. The guide is integrated with the Being a DIK - Season 3 DLC, and you can bring it up while playing with the press of a single button.
